DOC.brief_summary: Macular Hole Surgery with two different Dyes
DOC.brief_title: Brillant Blue Versus Indocyanine Green for Macular Hole Surgery
DOC.criteria: Idiopathic stage 3 and 4 macular holes Stage 2 macular holes, followed up for at least 6 months Pseudophakic and phakic eyes Age over 60 years Traumatic macular holes Secondary macular holes Severe ocular diseases
